name: Purgatory (itch) (soupWench)
description:
Purgatory is a first-person side scroller that was submitted for the Global Game Jam 2019. You play as a character who must battle his inner demons to cleanse his soul and find his way home to pass onto the afterlife in peace. We have taken the theme "what does home mean to you?" and looked at domestic violence and how it can affect people in their later life. 

Credits: 

Holly Bridges - Art and Design

Dylan Mckie - Programing

Spike Foster - Music and SFX
